statements: DELETE FROM EsportsCommunicationLogs WHERE team_id = 10 AND log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM TeamCommunicationLogs WHERE team_id = 3 AND log_id < 100;
DELETE FROM ChatHistories WHERE player_id = 5 AND chat_id IN (1, 2, 4);
DELETE FROM communication_logs WHERE team_id = 1 AND channel_id = 2;
DELETE FROM team_members WHERE player_id = 100 AND role = 'Admin';
DELETE FROM player WHERE team_id = 3 AND player_id = 5;
DELETE FROM team WHERE team_name = 'Manchester United';
